SSLConnectionState

IConnectionState
SSLConnectionState

TLSConnectionState

This class encapsulates the read or write state of a TLS connection, and implementes the encrypting and hashing of packets.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
